actions.text: Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3543. During consideration of the bill, the amendments recommeded by the Committee on Appropriations, as modified by the amendment printed in the report accompanying this resolution, shall be considered as having been agreed to and shall become original text for the purpose of amendment under the five-minute rule. All points of order against provisions in the bill, as modified, shall be waived.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 102-268, by Ms. Slaughter (NY).
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 65.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 254 - 164 (Roll no. 346).
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3543) making dire emergency supplemental appropriations and transfers for relief from the effects of natural disasters, for other urgent needs, and for incremental costs of "Operation Desert Shield/Desert Storm" for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1992, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3543 (supplemental appropriations and transfers for natural disaster relief and for Operations Desert Shield and Desert Storm).

titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3543) making dire emergency supplemental appropriations and transfers for relief from the effects of natural disasters, for other urgent needs, and for incremental costs of "Operation Desert Shield/Desert Storm" for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1992, and for other purposes.
